review: Doctor was extremely polite and gave a thorough explanation of the procedure before starting the treatment. His friendly and cheerful nature instantly washed away all my anxieties. I enjoyed a thoroughly professional and painless dental treatment. #Respect #Gratitude.

My implant treatment was highly satisfactory. The doctor was friendly and approachable which helped me with my anxiety. He was also available for post treatment clarifications. Was very happy with my treatment and would highly recommend this doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: After being quite skeptical about the dental treatments because of my past treatments, this Surgeon in choice made it quite easy for me to undergo with a complicated implant. He was reassuring personality and so could easily cope up with procedure. Quite satisfactory with the professionalism. Thank  you Dr. Akash !!

Dr was explained well and suggested the treatment for my tooth sensitivity, I went for the treatment and other doctor done the procedure to clean tooth and filling. * ******** *** ******* *** ***** *********** ** *** ***** **** ***** * ****** ******* ** ********* *** * **** ******** ** *** ***** **** ***** * **** **** *** ********  I have no hope to go back to same hospital.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am well satisfied with the service. No other doctor has spent so much tym in explaining to me wat led to this issue and how can it be stopped frm not happening again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was very satisfied with the implant and how approachable the doctor was post treatment for all clarifications. Highly recommended
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable response

review: Very friendly and approachable doctor. Was very satisfied with the treatment provided. Would highly recommend this doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor was very careful with his work, he made sure he explained what he was doing, and gave clear instructions what to be done on the following day. Quite happy with the treatment, recommend him for his handskill and communication skill !!
